summary.Title: Trainee Recruiter, Prague (Czech Republic) OR Bucharest (Romania)
summary.JobHeadline: Trainee Recruiter, Prague (Czech Republic) OR Bucharest (Romania)
summary.Presentation: David Kennedy Recruitment, Bangor, UK (Northern Ireland), is working with a leading consulting firm who is looking to onboard Danish speaking Trainee Recruiter for their Prague OR Bucharest office.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Trainee Recruiter, Prague (Czech Republic) OR Bucharest (Romania)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
David Kennedy Recruitment, Bangor, UK (Northern Ireland), is working with a leading consulting firm who is looking to onboard Danish speaking Trainee Recruiter for their Prague OR Bucharest office. 

Position: Trainee Recruiter

Location: Prague, Czech Republic OR Bucharest, Romania

Employment type: Full-time

Remuneration: Base salary. 

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Identify and screen suitable candidates for open and live positions
  • Build/grow your own desk (very important)
  • Prepare the candidate CVs for submission to clients
  • Arrange interviews for senior consultants
  • Contact potential clients via phone or email
  • Shadow senior consultants on their daily activities.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Very good level of Danish, both oral and written. Fluent in English
  • Academic or Professional degree in HR or related field will be considered as an advantage
  • Great communicator with ability to persuade and negotiate
  • Customer oriented with ability to build and nurture the relation
  • An ability of work within tight timescales and to the deadline
  • “Can-do” attitude and proactive approach
  • Computer literate with sound knowledge of MS Office package
  • Ability to travel in line with the business needs.
  • You thrive working in a fast-paced dynamic environment
  • Recent graduate
  • No previous recruitment experiences
  • Eligible to live & work either in Romania or Czech Republic.

BENEFITS:

  • Excellent commission-based package
  • Be part of a dynamic and creative team with positive and friendly atmosphere
  • Guidance and tools to reach your full potential
  • Support for relocation including subsidised apartment for the first 2 months (Prague).

More information:

David Kennedy, david@davidkennedyrecruitment.com

How to apply?

read the vacancy and apply online:

https://davidkennedyrecruitment.teamtailor.com/jobs/1622961-trainee-recruiter-danish
